I feel like might be a question for BB land.. anyone know of a reliable way to convert a julia filemode into a unix file mode string?
```julia> f, io = mktemp();
julia> filemode(f)
0x0000000000008180```

messages.text:
How do I build binaries of packages without a configure file?

I am building binary for Trilinos. It has multiple packages and (for simplicity's sake) YES packages have configure files and NEY packages don't. So when I finish the cmake (of all), configure (of YESs), make and install, binaries are generated only for YES packages. So it turns out NEY packages won't build with this resulting build_tarball:sweat_smile: So now I have a completed build_tarball
 which only builds half the packages required

elements.text:

I am building binary for Trilinos. It has multiple packages and (for simplicity's sake) YES packages have configure files and NEY packages don't. So when I finish the cmake (of all), configure (of YESs), make and install, binaries are generated only for YES packages. So it turns out NEY packages won't build with this resulting build_tarball

So now I have a completed build_tarball
 which only builds half the packages required
